election_record.label: New York 1800 State Senate, Middle District

overview.note: In Delaware county, Erastus Root, Gabriel North, Patrick Lamb and Isaac Hardenbergh were candidates for Assembly.
In Greene county, Caleb Benton, Thomas E. Barker and Martin G. Schuneman were candidates for Assembly whose votes were apparently put into the wrong box.

In Orange county, Peter Townsed, Andrew McCord, Henry Tucker, James Clinton, Aaron Burr, Seth Marvin, John Nicholson, Nathan H. White and William Faulkner were candidates for Assembly whose votes were apparently put into the wrong box.
In Ulster county, Conrad E. Elmendorf, Benjamin Bevier, Jr., Philip Eltinge, Cornelius Louw and Benjamin Ely were candidates for Assembly whose votes were apparently put into the wrong box.
John Hathorne received 2 votes as John Hathorn.
Thomas Sotherland received 1 vote as Thomas Southerland.
Jacobus S. Bruyn received 3 votes as James S. Bruyn.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: James W. Wilkin received 2 votes as James Wilkins.

sub_unit.name: Claverack
sub_unit.note: Jacobus S. Bruyn received 1 vote as Jacob S. Bruyn.

sub_unit.name: Delaware
sub_unit.note: Jacobus S. Bruyn received 6 votes as Jacobus Bruyn.
James W. Wilkin received 1 vote as James Wilkin.

sub_unit.name: Dutchess
sub_unit.note: Jacobus S. Bruyn received 3 votes as James S. Bruyn, 16 votes as Jacobus Bruyn, 113 votes as Jacob S. Bruyn and 1 vote as Jacobes Bruyn.
James W. Wilkin received 30 votes as James W. Watkins, 4 votes as James Wilkin, 4 votes as James Wilkins, 1 vote as James W. Wilkerson and 1 vote as James Witkins.
John C. Hogeboom received 2 votes as John Hogeboom.

sub_unit.name: Orange
sub_unit.note: John Hathorne received 2 votes as John Hathorn.
Thomas Sotherland received 1 vote as Thomas Southerland.
Jacobus S. Bruyn received 50 votes as James Bruyn.
James W. Wilkin received 1 vote as James Wilkin.

sub_unit.name: Rockland
sub_unit.note: John C. Hogeboom received 6 votes as John G. Hogeboom.

sub_unit.name: Ulster
sub_unit.note: John C. Hogeboom received 1 vote as John Hogeboom and 1 vote as John G. Hogeboom.
Jacobus S. Bruyn received 2 votes as Jacobus Bruyn.
James W. Wilkin received 1 vote as James Wilkin and 1 vote as James Wilkins.

election_record.reference: Original Election Books. Dutchess County Historian, Poughkeepsie.
American Citizen and General Advertiser (New York, NY). May 8, 1800.
The Daily Advertiser (New York, NY). May 9, 1800.
The Philadelphia Gazette and Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). May 10, 1800.
American Citizen and General Advertiser (New York, NY). May 16, 1800.
